main event: A civilian observer reported a flashing blue and blue-white object moving back and forth in the sky over Denver, Colorado on February 12, 1962.
interesting points: The observer described the object as consistent with an astronomical observation., The sighting had a visual duration of 5 seconds., The observer mentioned unlimited visibility and overcast light conditions., The object was observed at an altitude of 39,000 feet., There were no photographs or physical evidence recorded in the report.
